statements: SELECT * FROM booking_trends WHERE guest_name = 'Alice';
SELECT booking_id, guest_name, total_amount FROM booking_trends WHERE check_in_date = '2022-05-20';
SELECT guest_name, total_amount FROM booking_trends WHERE promotion_code IS NOT NULL;
SELECT booking_id, check_in_date FROM booking_trends WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT booking_id, guest_name, check_out_date FROM booking_trends WHERE guest_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY check_out_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM booking_trends WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT guest_name, total_amount, promotion_code FROM booking_trends WHERE promotion_code IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_bookings FROM booking_trends WHERE check_out_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM booking_trends WHERE guest_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY check_in_date;
SELECT AVG(total_amount) AS avg_amount, MAX(total_amount) AS max_amount FROM booking_trends WHERE total_amount < 5000;
SELECT * FROM bookings;
SELECT booking_id, booking_date, total_amount FROM bookings WHERE guest_id = 123;
SELECT guest_id, total_amount FROM bookings WHERE booking_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE discount_amount > 50;
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE guest_id = 123 ORDER BY booking_date DESC
SELECT booking_id, total_amount FROM bookings WHERE total_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM bookings JOIN promotions ON bookings.booking_date = promotions.start_date
SELECT booking_id, total_amount, promotion_name FROM bookings LEFT JOIN promotions ON bookings.guest_id = promotions.promotion_id
SELECT guest_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM bookings GROUP BY guest_id HAVING total_spent > 500 ORDER BY total_spent DESC
SELECT * FROM bookings;
SELECT booking_id, guest_id, total_amount FROM bookings WHERE status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT guest_name, phone_number FROM guests ORDER BY guest_name ASC;
SELECT promo_id, promo_code, discount_amount FROM promotions WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT guest_name, total_spent FROM guests WHERE total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE total_amount > 1000
SELECT guest_name, phone_number FROM guests WHERE total_spent < 500
SELECT booking_id, guest_id, booking_date FROM bookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC
SELECT promo_code, discount_amount FROM promotions WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01'
SELECT booking_id, guest_id, status FROM bookings WHERE guest_id = 101
SELECT * FROM bookings;
SELECT booking_id, guest_id, booking_date, total_amount FROM bookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT guest_name, email FROM guests WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT booking_id, booking_date, total_amount FROM bookings WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT promotion_name, discount_amount FROM promotions WHERE end_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM bookings;
SELECT guest_name, email FROM guests WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY guest_name ASC;
SELECT booking_id, booking_date, total_amount FROM bookings WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY booking_date DESC;

SELECT guest_name, email, promotion_name FROM guests JOIN bookings_promotions ON guests.guest_id = bookings_promotions.booking_id JOIN promotions ON bookings_promotions.promotion_id = promotions.promotion_id;

SELECT booking_id, guest_name, promotion_name, total_amount FROM bookings JOIN guests ON bookings.guest_id = guests.guest_id JOIN bookings_promotions ON bookings.booking_id = bookings_promotions.booking_id JOIN promotions ON bookings_promotions.promotion_id = promotions.promotion_id WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1500 ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM bookings;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM bookings WHERE total_price > 500;
SELECT room_number, room_type, price_per_night FROM rooms WHERE availability = true ORDER BY price_per_night DESC;
SELECT guest_name, email, membership_level FROM guests WHERE membership_level = 'Gold';
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE booking_id = 1;
SELECT guest_name, total_price FROM bookings WHERE check_in_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM rooms WHERE price_per_night BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY room_type DESC;
SELECT guest_name, email, membership_level FROM guests JOIN bookings ON guests.guest_id = bookings.guest_id;
SELECT room_number, max_occupancy, price_per_night FROM rooms WHERE availability = TRUE AND room_type = 'Suite';
